legalFinancial.question: What Legal and Financial Support Do We Provide?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Services
faq.question1: How long does the property buying process take in Costa Del Sol?
faq.answer1: Typically 60-90 days from offer acceptance to completion, with our expert guidance ensuring all legal and financial requirements are met efficiently.
faq.question2: What are the costs involved in buying property in Spain?
faq.answer2: Total costs typically range from 10-15% of property value, including taxes, legal fees, and registration costs. We provide detailed cost breakdowns upfront.
